dct_title_s: The " Sportsman's & tourist's guide" map of Scotland
dct_description_sm: By John Bartholomew, F.R.G.S. ; For the sportsman's & tourist's guide to the rivers, lochs, moors & deerforests of Scotland. Edited by J. Watson Lyall, & Co. Ltd.
Relief shown by spot heights and (at peaks) hachures.
Index to deer forests "Coloured Red and numbered on Map."
Shows roads, railroads, sea routes, cities and towns, waterways, islands, inns, lighthouses, roman wall, various place names (Becks, fells, forests, caves, castles, ponds, etc.).
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
